mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_email, mem_gender, mem_birthdate, mem_type, mem_join_dt) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name},#{email}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, '1', sysdate)
mapper.select: select email from web_member where email = #{email}
select mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_email, mem_gender, mem_birthdate from tbl_member where mem_id = #{id} and mem_pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update web_member set pw=#{pw}, tel=#{tel}, address = #{address} where email=#{email}
